Heath Brothers is incredible at making the most of every minute. The company was born in the early 1970s in a small town in upstate New York called Schenectady. Its founder, George Heath, was a former New York City cab driver who, in the 1970s, started his own business, selling used furniture on the side. He sold that business in 1980 to his brother, George.
